meta.title: Careers — GoLynk
meta.description: Join GoLynk — build the coordination layer for European logistics. Engineering, AI, operations, and research roles.

hero.heading: Build the Coordination Layer for European Logistics
hero.description: GoLynk turns routes already in motion into structured logistics capacity — corridor by corridor — under real constraints: timing, SLAs, verification, and carbon intensity.
hero.status: Germany-first. Europe next. Pilot deployment underway.

building.heading: What we're building
building.description: GoLynk is an orchestration platform that matches shipments to routes already in motion — couriers, fleets, crowd capacity, and microhubs — with multi-hop routing, SLA-aware constraint matching, verified handoffs, and measurable CO₂ impact per corridor.

orchestration.title: Orchestration
orchestration.description: Multi-hop routing across couriers, fleets, and microhubs.

density.title: Compounding density
density.description: Corridors get cheaper, faster, and cleaner as overlap grows.

systems.title: Systems Engineering
systems.description: Distributed orchestration, reliability, observability, event pipelines.
systems.examples: Examples: orchestration graph, execution state, monitoring, audit logs.

ai.title: AI & Optimization
ai.description: Constraint scoring, density learning, SLA-aware multi-hop chaining.
ai.examples: Examples: time windows, deviation bounds, ETA uncertainty, route ranking.

integrations.title: Integrations & Operator Tooling
integrations.description: APIs, dashboards, partner tooling, TMS/WMS connectivity.
integrations.examples: Examples: webhooks, data contracts, operator consoles, integration tiers.

deployment.title: Corridor Deployment & Operations
deployment.description: SLAs, playbooks, onboarding, microhub validation, corridor health.
deployment.examples: Examples: corridor launch, exception workflows, partner readiness.

research.title: Logistics Research (Zero-Touch)
research.description: Network economics, corridor design theory, incentives, verification systems.
research.examples: Examples: pricing fairness, trust models, corridor topology, automation-first ops.

items.density: Corridor density as a compounding system
items.pricing: Pricing that aligns incentives across the network
items.integrations: Integrations that fit existing fleets and tools

howWeWork.heading: How we work
howWeWork.subline: We optimize for long-term network integrity over short-term expansion.

generalApplication.heading: General application
generalApplication.description: If you don't see a perfect match, send an introduction.
generalApplication.microcopy: Include links (LinkedIn/GitHub) and a short note on what you want to build.
